name: Unity Fight
description:
Fighting game made in Unity, based on classic fighting games like Dead or Alive, Street Fighter. Tekken.

Various single moves or combos can be achieved by different combinations of buttons.

Currently a limited selection of characters, maps, and game mode. (Local PvP only)

P1 controls: W/A/S/D Block(Q) Attack Buttons (R,F,V)

P2 controls: Up/Down/Left/Right Block(NumPad Enter) 

Attack Buttons (NumPad 1, 2, 3)
